biocontainers.name: segemehl
biocontainers.summary: A software to map short sequencer reads to reference genomes. unlike other methods, segemehl is able to detect not only mismatches but also insertions and deletions. furthermore, this tool is not limited to a specific read length and is able to map primer- or polyadenylation contaminated reads correctly.

biotools.summary: A software to map short sequencer reads to reference genomes. Unlike other methods, segemehl is able to detect not only mismatches but also insertions and deletions. Furthermore, this tool is not limited to a specific read length and is able to map primer- or polyadenylation contaminated reads correctly.
